☰ Document Outline

The Bhuvanakośa

Digital Critical Edition of Bhuvanakośa

edited by Andrea Acri

Current Version: draft, 2023-04-28Z
Still in progress – do not quote without permission.
  • Witnesses
  • Metadata

List of Witnesses

  • La: University Library (UB), Leiden, Lontar, Or. 23732
    • Content:
      • Vipañcitārthā by Śāntarakṣita
    • Colophon:
      • Physical Description: Palm-leaf manuscript. 89 leaves in Kuṭilā script. Apparently written in 1152 A.C.
      • Hand Description: A1H1main hand of the manuscript, black ink, Sundanese script
      • History: In June 1934, Sāṅkṛtyāyana found this manuscript in the monastery of Kun-de-ling (Lhasa).
    • Ba: University Library (UB), Leiden, Lontar, Or. 23732
      • Content:
        • Vipañcitārthā by Śāntarakṣita
      • Colophon:
        • Physical Description: Palm-leaf manuscript. 89 leaves in Kuṭilā script. Apparently written in 1152 A.C.
        • Hand Description: A1H1main hand of the manuscript, black ink, Sundanese script
        • History: In June 1934, Sāṅkṛtyāyana found this manuscript in the monastery of Kun-de-ling (Lhasa).
      • Bb: University Library (UB), Leiden, Lontar, Or. 23732
        • Content:
          • Vipañcitārthā by Śāntarakṣita
        • Colophon:
          • Physical Description: Palm-leaf manuscript. 89 leaves in Kuṭilā script. Apparently written in 1152 A.C.
          • Hand Description: A1H1main hand of the manuscript, black ink, Sundanese script
          • History: In June 1934, Sāṅkṛtyāyana found this manuscript in the monastery of Kun-de-ling (Lhasa).
        • Fa: University Library (UB), Leiden, Lontar, Or. 23732
          • Content:
            • Vipañcitārthā by Śāntarakṣita
          • Colophon:
            • Physical Description: Palm-leaf manuscript. 89 leaves in Kuṭilā script. Apparently written in 1152 A.C.
            • Hand Description: A1H1main hand of the manuscript, black ink, Sundanese script
            • History: In June 1934, Sāṅkṛtyāyana found this manuscript in the monastery of Kun-de-ling (Lhasa).

          Metadata of the Edition

          • Title: The Bhuvanakośa. Digital Critical Edition of Bhuvanakośa
          • Text Identifier: DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa
          • Edited by Andrea Acri
          • Copyright © 2019-2025 by Andrea Acri.

          This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

          1

          Brahmarahasya, Paṭala 1

          Brahmarahasyaṁ, Prathamaḥ Paṭalaḥ

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          1

          Brahmarahasya, Paṭala 1

          1.1

          fleuron avighnam astu fleuron

          1.2

          saṅ saṅgrahakāri sira movus| liṅnira|

          (1)

          praṇamya śirasā devam| vakti munir amanmathaḥ| devadeva mahādeva| parameśvara śaṅkara|| 1

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (2)(3)(4)(5)(6)(7)(8)

          1.3

          śrī muni bhārgava| sira mahyun tumakvanakәn ikaṅ pada nirbāṇa ri bhaṭāra| maṅkana pvābhiprāyanira| manambhah ta sira ri bhaṭāra| śirasā| makakaraṇa hulunira sira| ri tәlasnira manambhah| mojar ta sira|| he devadeva| kita deva\-niṅ devata kabeh| he mahādeva| kita bhaṭāra mahādeva ṅaranta| he maheśvara| kita bhaṭāra maheśvara ṅaranta| he śaṅkara| kita bhaṭāra śaṅkara ṅa\-ran\-ta||

          śūnyaś ca nirbāṇādhikaḥ| śivāṅgatve nirīkṣyate| kutaḥ tadvākyam atulam| śrutvā devo ’vati\-ṣṭhata || 2

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (9)(10)(11)(12)(13)(14)

          1.4

          nāhan takvanaknani ṅhulun ri bhaṭāra| hana ya pada śūnya| ya sinaṅguh ka\-mo\-kṣan| ṅa| viśeṣa ya| ya śiva ṅaranya| nirīkṣyate| katon pva ya de saṅ yogīśvara| kutaḥ deśe| ndi tekā deśa katonanira| sājñā bhaṭāra| an maṅkana kottamaniṅ vuvus saṅ {\rd}ṣi| ya ta karәṅ{\schwal} de\ bhaṭāra||\\ deva uvāca| mojar ta bhaṭāra| liṅnira||

          svaśarīre mahāyogī| paśyate h{\rdit}dayāntare| vākyan te parameśānam| sūryāyutasamaprabham|| 3

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (15)

          1.5

          nihan vuvusani ṅhulun i kita| ikā saṅ mahāyogī| sira tumon bhaṭāra pa\-ra\-meś\-va\-ra| sateja sira lāvan tejaniṅ āditya sāyuta| ṅkā ri śarīranira mvaṅ ri hatinira||

          h{\rdit}distham sarvabhūtānām| paśyate jalacakravat| anādimadhyanidhanam| śivāṅgadhyānam am{\rdit}tam|| 4

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          1.6

          lvir bhaṭāra śiva| sira ta muṅgu ri hatiniṅ sarva māvak| tar pādi| tar pa\-ma\-dhya| tar pānta| laṅgәṅ hananira| kadi jalacakra rūpanira| sira ta katon de saṅ yogīśvara||

          manasā darśyate svīra| samī\-bhū\-tena cakṣuṣā| h{\rdit}disthāne lalāṭe vā| mūrdhāntari nirīkṣyate|| 5

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (16)(17)(18)(19)(20)

          1.7

          ikā taṅ pada maṅkana| ya ta katon denta| makakaraṇa manahta| mvaṅ jñāna jitendriya| ṅkā ri tumpukniṅ hati| riṅ rahi| tәṅahniṅ hulu| maṅkāna vuvusani ṅhulun i kitaṅ vīra||

          (21)

          yatra yatra samuddīkṣya | tatra tatraiva labhyate| padma\-kuḍma\-la\-saṁsthānam| trikoṇasya samīraṇam|| 6

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (22)(23)(24)(25)

          1.8

          katon\ pvekaṅ pada maṅkana de saṅ yogīśvara| kapaṅguh ta ya ṅkāna denira| mvaṅ hana ta trikoṇa muṅgu i pucakniṅ padma| mālyaṅ ta ya vih||

          adhomukhaṁ kucāntare| h{\rdit}daye sarvadehinām| daśāṇām api nāḍīnām| mūlam etadvilambinām|| 7

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (26)(27)(28)(29)(30)

          1.9

          lvirniṅ hatiniṅ sarva māvak| sumuṅsaṅ ya| muṅgvī pāntaraniṅ susu kālih| pratyakṣa pinakavitniṅ daśanāḍī| viśeṣa ya| tumayuṅ lvirnya||

          (31)

          kucāntare mahānāḍī| k{\rdit}śaṅ k{\rdit}ṣṇaṁ mahām{\rdit}tam| sah{\rdit}dantacarā bhinnā| nīlāñjanasamaprabham|| 8

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (32)(33)(34)(35)

          1.10

          ikaṅ mahānāḍī| muṅgv i hati| mahirәṅ malīt ya| mahām{\rd}ta ya| paḍa tejanya lāvan nīlāñjana| ya ta dudug tәkeṅ hulu| an sake hati||

          (36)

          tatra vasati deveśaḥ| śiva-śūnya-nirindriyaḥ| nirvikāro mahātmānam| bhūtānāñ jīva eva ca|| 9

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (37)

          1.11

          ṅkāna riṅ nāḍī| muṅguh ta bhaṭāra śiva| sira ta tinūt iṅ devata kabeh| śūnya sira| nirindriya| kinatayan ta sira deniṅ ṣoḍaśavikāra| uttama sira| tātar kәneṅ vikāra| sira pinakajīvaniṅ dadi kabeh||

          (38)

          acalaś cālayet sarvam| jagatsthāvarajaṅgamam| vyāpī nityaṁbhāvo vīra| durjñeyo jñānavarjitaiḥ|| 10

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (39)(40)

          1.12

          lvir bhaṭāra śiva haneriya| vyāpaka nitya| meṅәt sira tañ cala| mevәh sirān kavruhana deniṅ hīnajñāna| sira tamar cala irikaṅ jagat kabeh| sthāvarajaṅgamā\-vak\-nya||

          jñānavidā mahādevaḥ| h{\rdit}dayāntari saṁsthitaḥ| nitya-d{\rdit}ṣṭo mahāśūnyam| dehinām antarikṣavat|| 11

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (41)(42)(43)

          1.13

          bhaṭāra mahādeva| sira ta nityomuṅgv i tumpukaniṅ hati| ṅkāneṅ sarva mā\-vak| tar katahәnan| kady ākāśa lvirnira| sira ta katon de saṅ vruh riṅ jñāna||

          (44)(45)

          daśanāḍyo ’rkakarās syuḥ | h{\rdit}dayād abhiniḥs{\rdit}tāḥ| śarīre vitatāḥ sarve| jagaty arkasya raśmivat|| 12

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (46)(47)(48)

          1.14

          ikā taṅ daśanāḍī| ya ta alivat saṅka ri hatiniṅ maśarīra| pәnuh riṅ rāt kabeh| kadi tejaniṅ āditya lvirnya||

          (49)

          mālatī nāma nāḍī ca| aṣṭaśatañ śiroruhe| tiryagaivottha-nābhy eva| dattvā tuṣṭiṁ maheśvaraḥ|| 13

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (50)(51)(52)

          1.15

          hana ta nāḍī mālatī| ṅa| vvaluṅ ātus ag{\schwal}ṅnya saṅkeṅ rambut| tәkeṅ tumpuk\-niṅ hati| makahīṅaniṅ nābhi| ikā taṅ nāḍī maṅkana| ya ta mahasukha bhaṭāra parameśvara||

          (53)(54)(55)

          nālaretakasaṁjñaś ca| nāḍī k{\rdit}ṣṇahimaprabhā| dvividhātha pramāṇa-syāt| h{\rdit}daye mūrdha-bhinnataḥ|| 14

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (56)

          1.16

          mvaṅ hana ta nāḍī vaneh| nālaretakā| ṅa| kadi tejaniṅ meghāhirәṅ tejanya| rvāṅ kilan kaliṅkiṅan davānya| ya ta tәkeṅ kapāla| an saṅkeṅ hati||

          (57)

          purastāt sampravakṣyāmi| nāḍīnām iti mūlatām| eteṣāṁ dvijarājendra| tubhyaṁ sarvam aśeṣataḥ|| 15

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (58)(59)(60)

          1.17

          nihan varahakna rumuhun i kita dvijendra| tar paśeṣa deṅkv amarahakәn ike||

          idānīṁsampravakṣyāmi| h{\rdit}dayānte vidhānakam| prayatnaṁ dvijarājendra| ś{\rdit}ṇu garbhaṁ h{\rdit}di sthitam|| 16

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (61)(62)

          1.18

          hana ta yukti gavayakna saṅ paṇḍita| ya ta varahaknaṅku maṅke| bhaṭāra pinakesini hatinta| prayatnā ta kita dvijarājendra||

          h{\rdit}dante vivare vīra| pañcavarṇam atiprabham| rakta-trivarṇam āsītam| dīptaṁ sphaṭikasannibham|| 17

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (63)(64)(65)

          1.19

          hana ta varṇa lima kvehnya| atiśaya tejanya| muṅgv i tumpukniṅ hati| mālyaṅ ta ya| lvirnya| ikaṅ rakta aghora| ikaṅ trivarṇa| bāṅ| putih| k{\rd}ṣ\-ṇa| ya tatpuruṣa| ikaṅ hirәṅ paḍa lāvan nīlāñjana| ya sadya| ikaṅ kadi tejaniṅ āditya| ya bāmadeva| ikaṅ kadi maṇik sphaṭika| ya īśāna| nāhan kramanya| kavruhana ta kitaṅ vīra||

          svacchaṁ sūkṣmaṁ paraṁ śūnyam| śivaṅ kaivalyam acyutam| anāmayam anidhanam| anādimadhyamāntikam|| 18

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (66)

          1.20

          hana ta pada śūnya| malilaṅ ta ya| viśeṣa ikā| mālit ya paramasūkṣma| ya kai\-val\-ya| ṅa| tar pakahilaṅan| tan pādi| tar pamadhya| tan pānta| ya kāraṇaniṅ dadi kabeh| ya kalīnanya||

          nirañjanaṁ nirākāram| nirgātrevaṁ vinis{\rdit}tam| aṣṭaśivasya nirmālyam| paran nirbāṇam avyayam|| 19

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (67)

          1.21

          tan karakәtan mala| tan palvir| tan pagatra| vyāpaka| yoṅgvaṅ saṅ hyaṅ aṣ\-ṭa\-śi\-va| tar pacala| viśeṣa ya||

          etat paramanirbāṇam| etat kevalaśāntikam| paramātmā mahādevam| parameśvarasaṁjñakam|| 20

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          1.22

          ikaṅ pada maṅkana| ya paramanirbāṇa| ya kaivalyapada| ya paramātmā| ya mahādeva| ya parameśvara ṅaranira||

          śivaṁ paraṁ brahma muniḥ| prototam ākhya-tal labhet| dhyātvā mahāprayatnena| h{\rdit}dante ca lalāṭake|| 21

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (68)(69)(70)(71)

          1.23

          hana ta śivapada| ṅa| paraṁ brahma| ṅa| ya tāṅәnaṅәnәn saṅ viku| ma\-ka\-ka\-ra\-ṇaṅ manahnira| pinaṅguhnira pva ya| ṅkā ri tumpukniṅ hati| yatnā ta si\-ra||

          mūrdhini-m-evāpi muniḥ| praviśet śivam uttamam| praṇaṣṭa-kramate vīra| yatnataḥ sampratiṣṭhati|| 22

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          1.24

          ṅkāna ry uṅgulnirāṅәnaṅәnәnira ya| māti pvekā saṅ viku| mantuk ta sira ri pada bhaṭāra śiva| sayojya ta sira lāvan bhaṭāra śiva| makanimittaṅ yat\-na\-ni\-ra| maṅkana vuvusaṅkv i kitaṅ vīra||

          (72)

          vidhmātāruṇatāmrabham| padmarāgasamaprabham| vahnīnāṁ teja-bāhūnām| antare manaso ’ntare|| pradīptādityasaṅkāśaḥ| jyotijvalitapiṅgalam| mānasaiva vijānīyāt| viśvadevaṁ h{\rdit}diṣṭhitam|| 23

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (73)(74)(75)(76)

          1.25

          hana ta padābāṅ| kadi tambagenapi lvirnya| paḍa tejanya lāvan maṇi pad\-ma\-rā\-ga| kady āditya vāhu mәtu| mvaṅ kadi tejaniṅ apuy| viśvadeva hyaṅnya| muṅ\-gvī hati| aghora vīja ṅkāna|| oṁ aṁ namaḥ| ya ta kavruhana saṅ viku| riṅ ākāśa| ry antaraniṅ manah| makakāraṇaṅ manahnira||

          tadantari trivarṇa-syāt| mahendradhanusannibham| mātrapañcaka-tadvījam| evan tatpuruṣottamam|| 24

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (77)(78)(79)

          1.26

          hana ta trivarṇa| bāṅ| putih| hirәṅ| tatpuruṣa\ vīja ṅkāna| muṅgu ri hati| kadi vaṅkava lvirnya| mahirәṅ| mabāṅ| maputih| pañcatanmātra\ buddhi| ya ta ma\-ka\-pa\-da tatpuruṣa| vīja ṅkāna| oṁ taṁ namaḥ||

          (80)

          sa evaṁ prāṇa uktaiva| dehināṁ brahmamantrataḥ| asitavarṇa-m-ity uktam| nīlāñjanasamaprabham|| 25

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (81)

          1.27

          ikā ta vinarahakәnku| ya prāṇaniṅ sarva māvak| ya brahmamantra| mvaṅ hana ta varṇa mahirәṅ| vaiṣṇavī vīja ṅkāna| oṁ saṁ namaḥ| paḍa lāvan nīlāñjana tejanya||

          (82)

          tadante parisaṁs{\rdit}ṣṭaḥ| viṣṇu-v-avyakta-m-ucyate| tasyāntare prabhāmātram| sūryāyutasamaprabham|| 26

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (83)(84)

          1.28

          ikaṅ abyakta viṣṇu ya| mijil saṅke vitniṅ hati| ri tәṅahniṅ hati| hana ta prabhā paḍa lāvan sūrya sāyuta tejanya| bāmadeva vīja ṅkāna|| oṁ bāṁ namaḥ||

          puruṣo vai mahābrahma| mahādyutī-r-anopamaḥ| sphaṭikasya mahāsūkṣmaḥ| īśvaravījasaṁjñakaḥ|| 27

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (85)(86)

          1.29

          saṅ hyaṅ brahma| ātmā sira| atiśaya kvehniṅ tejanira| paḍa sira lāvan tejaniṅ maṇik sphaṭika| brāhmī vīja ṅkāna|| oṁ īṁ namaḥ| mahāsūkṣma sira| sira īśvara| ṅa||

          paraṁ brahma mahāsūkṣmam| śāntaṁ paramanirmalam| ’vayavamātra saṁnyasya| aṅguṣṭhaparimāṇataḥ|| 28

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (87)

          1.30

          hana ta parambrahma| ātmā sira| ṅa| sira mahāsūkṣma| śāntas paramanirmala sira| sāvayava pramāṇa saṅkeṅ aṅguṣṭha||\ledpb

          (88)

          tatra śūnyam sadājñeyam| śivanirmalasaṁjñikam| tathākṣarasamārabdham| nirakṣaram anāmayam|| 29

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (89)

          1.31

          lvirniṅ pada ṅkeṅ śarīra| atyantevәhniṅ kakavruhanya| malilaṅ ta ya| tar pa\-ka\-hi\-laṅ\-an ginave deniṅ akṣara| ndān kag{\rd}hītanya nirakṣara ya| apan kasurudan sukhaduhkha||

          (90)

          dvividhaś ca mahādevaḥ| jñātavyaḥ munisattamaiḥ| śāntaśūnyam anaupamyam| mokṣaṁ śivapadam brajet|| 30

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (91)(92)(93)(94)

          1.32

          sira ta bhaṭāra mahādeva| sira kavruhana de saṅ viku| samaṅkana vuvusani ṅhulun i kitaṅ vīra| viśeṣāṅaṅәnaṅәn pva sira| mantuk ta sira riṅ śivapada| lvirnya| śūnya śānta| tan papaḍa riṅ viśeṣa| ya kamokṣan| ṅa||

          (95)(96)

          dine dine mahāyogī| svātmānam upapadyate| sarvapāpāni dehe ’smin| dahet kāṣṭham ivānalaḥ|| 31

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (97)(98)(99)

          1.33

          deyānira saṅ yogīśvara| patәmvakna jugāvaknira lāvan bhaṭāra | sārisāri maṅkana pva sira| ginәsәṅanira ta pāpanira kabeh| ṅkāne śarīranira| kady aṅgāniṅ apuy maṅgәsәṅi kayukayu||

          (100)

          yadi pāpasahasrāṇi| kāṣṭham ivāgninā dahet| svadehaiśvaryam āgacchet| vrajen mokṣaṁ śivātmakam|| 32

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (101)

          1.34

          saṅ yogīśvara sira tumunvīrikaṅ pāpa sevu| kāṅkәn kayu\ ikā| makakaraṇaṅ jñāna viśeṣa| yāṅkәn apuya| tәlas pva sirān tumunvīriya| kapaṅguh taṅ kaiśvaryan denira| tar paśeṣa pva denira| kapaṅguh taṅ kamokṣan ginavayakәn| lvirnira||

          (102)

          aiśvaryav{\rdit}ddhim ādhikyam| sarvabhūtavaśaṅkaram| labhyate munir atyantam| mokṣam paramadurlabham|| 33

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (103)(104)

          1.35

          pinaṅguh saṅ viku ikaṅ kaiśvaryan| v{\rd}ddhi ya| viśeṣa kumavaśākәn sarva\-bhū\-ta gavayanya| yātyanta kamokṣan| ṅa| atiśaya riṅ mevәh||

          1.36

          fleuron iti bhuvanasāṁnidhyanāmaśāstram| brahmarahasyam prathamaḥ paṭalaḥ fleuron

          (105)

          2

          Brahmarahasya, Paṭala 2

          Brahmarahasyaṁ, Dvitīyaḥ Paṭalaḥ

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ iti tattvam| bhautikaṁ bhuvanatrayam| raktavarṇam aghoran tat| nābhyān nyāset manīṣibhiḥ|| 1

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (106)

          2.1

          nihan taṅ tribhuvana| ṅa| bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ| indraloka| ṅa| vinarahakәn de bhaṭāra| rakta varṇanira| aghora vījanira| ikā taṅ aghora| ya ta nyāsakna saṅ paṇḍita riṅ pusәr| oṁ aṁ namaḥ||

          (107)

          brahmāprajāpatisthānam| gāyatrīsaṁsthitam bhavet| trivarṇa-triguṇaṁ jñeyam| jaṭhari saṁnyaset vudhaḥ|| 2

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (108)(109)

          2.2

          i ruhurnikā| hana ta pada mahāloka| ṅa| uṅgvan saṅ dakṣa prajāpati| gāyatrī vīja ṅkāna| ikaṅ gāyatrī tiga varṇanya| bāṅ| putih| hirәṅ| ya triguṇa| ṅa| sattva| rajah| tamah| kavruhana ikā| ya ta nyāsakna saṅ paṇḍita riṅ vtәṅ| oṁ taṁ namaḥ||

          (110)

          pañcaśuddhā vicaryante| vaiṣṇavī vīja-sambhavet| nīlāñjanaprabhātulyam| h{\rdit}disthaṁ saṁnyaset vudhaḥ|| 3

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (111)

          2.3

          i ruhurnikā| hana ta pada janaloka| ṅa| uṅgvan saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu| kinahanan ta ya deniṅ pañcaśuddha| lvirnya| avidyā| svabhāva| prak{\rd}ti| pradhāna| abyakta| nahan taṅ viṣṇubheda| lima kvehnya| ātmā ya| vaiṣṇavī vija ṅkāna| ma\-hi\-rәṅ kadi nīlāñjana tejanya| ya ta nyāsakna saṅ paṇḍita riṅ hati| oṁ saṁ namaḥ||

          (112)

          2

          Brahmarahasya, Paṭala 2

          naiva jñeyam akartavyam| prabhāmātram atīndriyam| akarmatvān mahāprabham| pauruṣo vakṣasi sthitam|| 4

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (113)(114)(115)(116)

          2.1

          i ruhurnikā| hana ta pada tapoloka| ṅa| uṅgvan saṅ hyaṅ brahmā| bāmadeva vīja ṅkāna| antarātmā kojaranya| prabhāmātra lvirnya| tan kinavruhan deniṅ indriya| tan pagave| tan ginave| uṅgvan saṅ puruṣa ya| ya ta nyāsakna saṅ paṇḍita riṅ dhadha| oṁ bāṁ namaḥ||

          satyalokan tathā rudraḥ| brahma jīvam anādhikam| aiśvaryaṁ svaccha-paramam| kaṇṭhamūle nyased vudhaḥ|| 5

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (117)

          2.2

          i ruhurnikā| hana ta pada satyaloka| ṅa| uṅgvan saṅ hyaṅ rudra| īśāna vīja ṅkāna| paramātmā ya| viśeṣa ya| ya brahmamantrapada| ya jīva anadhika| ya kaiśvaryan| ṅa| malilaṅ lvirnya| ya ta nyāsakna saṅ paṇḍita ri vitniṅ gulu| oṁ iṁ namaḥ||

          akāran nirmalaṁ śūnyam| śivaṁ param anāmayam| ’vyaktaṁ sarveṣu bhūteṣu| kaṇṭhe śivapuran nyaset|| 6

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (118)(119)

          2.3

          i ruhurnikā| hana ta pada śivapura| ṅa| uṅgvan bhaṭāra śiva| akāra vīja ṅkāna| nirātmā kojaranira| alilaṅ śūnya| ya śiva ṅaranira| viśeṣa ya| kasurudan sukha\-duhkha| vyāpaka riṅ sarvabhūta| ya ta nyāsakna saṅ paṇḍita riṅ gulu| oṁ aṁ namaḥ||

          (120)

          atyantanirmalañ chūnyam| dhruvaṁ śivataran tathā| tālukānte nirānandam| ukāraṁ sannidhāpayet|| 7

          (121)

          2.4

          paramātyantam atulam āthulam| niścalañ ca nirāmayam| śivatamo makāraś ca| bhrūmadhye sannidhāpayet|| 8

          (122)(123)

          2.14

          yat tat| na rūpam| na varṇam| na rasam| na gandham| na śabdam| na sparśam| anāmayam| acintyam| anādimadhyāntam| amitam| asaṅkīrṇam| agātram| aracanam| advitīyam| acalitam| a\-liṅ\-ga\-kam| acyutam| akṣayam| nirgatam| asp{\rdit}ham| agarbhajanmamaraṇam| na rogam| na śokam| na vedanam| na malam| na saṅ\-sā\-ram| na kālam| anākāśam| asambatsarartumāsāhorātram| asan\-dhy\-āṅ\-śam| na muhūrtam| na velakaṣṭham| nottarāyanam| na dak\-ṣi\-ṇā\-ya\-nam| na vaiṣuvam| animeṣam| śāntam| puruṣo| asandhi| virahitam| śū\-nyam| dhruvam| param| satyam| vi\-dhi\-tāṁ| na| śū\-nyā\-ti\-śū\-nyam| svaccham| kaivalyam| nirāśrayam| śivam| mokṣam| niraśraddham| na vikalpam| na kalpam| nirbāṇam| paraṁ brah\-ma| nirākā\-ram| na bhayam| am{\rdit}tam| etad brahmapadam| sa eṣa devaḥ| saḥ paramārthaḥ| saḥ parameśvaraḥ| saḥ paramātmā| saḥ śreṣṭhaḥ| vigatendriyaḥ| tad brahmāntam| mokṣam| aniruddham| nirāmayam| paraṁ nirbāṇam| nirvikāram| amaryādam| pa\-raṁ pa\-dam| an\-āś\-ra\-vam| eṣa eva mahādevaḥ| vyāpīyam| sūkṣmīyam| mā\-hī\-yam| va\-rī\-yam| vitanuḥ| atīndriyaḥ| hitasadām{\rdit}taḥ| śuddhaḥ| niṣ\-ka\-laḥ| śā\-śvataḥ| sa eva| mātā| pitā| bandhuḥ| svajanaḥ| mitraḥ| guruḥ| de\-vaḥ| ma\-hār\-dhi\-kaḥ| mahādeva iti||

          (139)(140)(141)(142)(143)(144)(145)(146)(147)(148)(149)(150)(151)(152)(153)(154)(155)(156)(157)(158)(159)(160)(161)(162)(163)(164)(165)(166)(167)(168)(169)(170)(171)(172)(173)(174)(175)(176)(177)(178)(179)

          2.12

          na rūpam| tan parūpa sira| na varṇam| tan pavarṇa sira| na rasam| tan parasa sira| na gandham| tar pagandha sira| na śabdam| tan paśabda sira| asparśam| tan kasparśa sira| anāmayam| tar kәneṅ lara sira| acintyam| tar kәneṅ hiḍәp| anādimadhyāntam| tan ādi| tan madhya| tan anta| amitam| tan pahīṅan| a\-saṅ\-kīr\-ṇam| tan parok| agātram| tar pavāk| aracanam| tan karakәtan iṅ rūpavarṇa| advitīyam| tan hana lumәvihana saṅke sirān maviśeṣa| acalitam| tañ cāla| aliṅgakam| tan hana liṅgeriya| acyutam| tar pakasurudan| akṣayam| tan palvaṅ| nirgatam| tar pagati| asp{\rdit}ham| tar pahyun| agarbhajanmamaraṇam| tar kәna riṅ garbhajanmamaraṇa| arogam| tan hana lara ri sira| aśokam| tar kәneṅ kiṅ\-kiṅ| avedanam| tan paṅhidhәp lara| asaṅsāram| tan paṅhidhәp saṅsāra| nirmalam| tan pamala| na kālam| tan pakāla| nākāśam| tan pākāśa| na saṁvatsarartumāsāhorātram| tan patahun| tan parәtu| tan pavulan| tan parahinavәṅi| asandhyāṅśam| tan pasandhyāṅśa| na muhūrtam| tan pamuhūrta| na velaka\-ṣṭham| tan pavelakaṣṭha| nottarāyanam| tan pottarāyana| na dak\-ṣi\-ṇā\-ya\-nam| tan pa\-da\-kṣi\-ṇā\-ya\-na| na vaiṣuvam| tan paviṣuvāyaṇa| animeṣam| tan hana kәḍap iriya| śāntam| śānta| ... śūnyam| śūnya|| dhruvam| meṅәt| param| viśeṣa| satyam| tәpәt| vītaṁ| śūnyātiśūnyam| ... svaccham| malilaṅ| kaivalyam| kaivalya| nirāśrayam| tan pāśraya| śivam| ya śiva| ṅa| mokṣam| ya kamokṣan| niraśraddham| tar elik| ... nirbāṇam| ya kamokṣan| paraṁ brahma| sira viśeṣaniṅ brahma| nirākāram| tan palvir| na bhayam| tar kәneṅ bhaya| am{\rdit}tam| tar kәneṅ pati| etaṁ brahmapadam| nāhan ta rūpanira brahmapada| ṅa| sa eṣa devaḥ| sira deva| saḥ paramārthaḥ| sira paramārtha| saḥ maheśvaraḥ| sira maheśvara| saḥ paramātmā| sira paramātmā| saḥ śreṣṭhaḥ| sira viśeṣa| vigatendriyaḥ| tan hanendriye sira| tad brahmāntam| sira brahmāntapada| mokṣam| sira kamokṣan| aniruddham| tar kәneṅ sukhaduhkha| nirāmayam| tar kәneṅ prihati| paran nirbāṇam| sira paramanirbāṇa| nirvikāram| sira tar kәneṅ vi\-kā\-ra| tan rәṅat kalīṅanira| a\-mar\-yā\-dam| param| viśeṣaniṅ viśeṣa| paraṁ padam| sira pada viśeṣa| anāśravam| tar ili| eṣa eva mahādevaḥ| sira mahādeva | ṅa| vyāpī\-yam| sira pәnuh iṅ rāt kabeh| sūkṣmīyam| sira viśeṣaniṅ halit| māhīyam| varī\-yam| sirātiśayaniṅ raya vastu| vitanuḥ| sira tan pāvak| atīndriyaḥ| sira lәvih iṅ tan katon| hitasadām{\rdit}taḥ| sira am{\rd}ta sadāsukha| śuddhaḥ| sira tan patalәtәh| niṣ\-ka\-lam| sira niṣkala| śāśvataḥ| sira nitya| sa eva mātā| sira ibu| sa eva pitā| sira bapa| saḥ vandhuḥ| sira kadaṅ| saḥ svajanaḥ| sira varga| saḥ mitraḥ| sira mitra| saḥ guruḥ| sira guru| saḥ devaḥ| sira deva| saḥ mahārdhikaḥ| sira ma\-hār\-dhika|| sira saṅ maṅkana kramanira| mahādeva iti| sira bhaṭāra ma\-hā\-de\-va| ṅa||

          (180)(181)(182)(183)(184)(185)(186)(187)(188)(189)(190)(191)(192)(193)(194)(195)(196)(197)(198)(199)(200)(201)(202)(203)(204)(205)

          tathā jñātvā mahādevaḥ| vyāpī sarvaśarīriṣu| akāśam iva kumbheṣu| vrajen mokṣam anāśrayam|| 15

          (206)(207)(208)

          2.13

          sira saṅ yogī vruh ri bhaṭāra mahādeva| vyāpaka riṅ sarva māvak| kady aṅgāniṅ ākāśa| vyāpaka riṅ sarva māvak| maṅkana riṅ kumbha makveh| inandәlan iṅ vulan tuṅgal| maṅkanāsimpәn iṅ nora| ulihniṅ kabeh| taṅkәs viśeṣa irikaṅ ṣadvarga| sirāta mantuk riṅ kamokṣapadan| tar pahīṅan lәpasnira||

          (209)

          aṣṭadeva-tathā sthāne| ekasthāne ca mānuṣe| pañcasthānam eva tiryak| śiva-m-eko ’dhitiṣṭhati|| 16

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (210)

          2.14

          devata vvalu bhedanya| lvirnira| brahmā| prajāpati| mahendra| soma| gan\-dha\-rva| yakṣa| preta| piśāca| nāhan ta bhedanya| mānuṣa tuṅgal| ndañ caturjanma vilaṅnya| brāhmaṇa| kṣatriya| vaiśya| śūdra| nāhan taṅ caturjanma| ṅa| kunaṅ ikaṅ tiryak lima bhedanya| paśu| m{\rd}ga| pakṣi| saris{\rd}pa| sthāvara| nāhan bhedanya| de bhaṭāra śiva| sira ta eka viśeṣa umuṅgv iṅ rāt kabeh||

          (211)(212)(213)(214)

          śivas sarvagatas sūkṣmaḥ| bhūtānām antarikṣavat| acintyam manasāgrāhyam| naindriyam parig{\rdit}hyate|| 17

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (215)(216)(217)

          2.15

          bhaṭāra śiva sira vyāpaka| sira sūkṣma tar kәneṅ aṅәnaṅәn| kady aṅgāniṅ ākāśa sira| tan kag{\rd}hita deniṅ manah| mvaṅ indriya||

          kāṣṭhe kāṣṭhe yathā bahniḥ| sūkṣmatvān nopalabhyate| bhūte bhūte mahādevaḥ| sūkṣmatvān nopalabhyate || 18

          (218)(219)(220)

          2.16

          saṅ hyaṅ apuy hanerikaṅ kayukayu| ndātan katon| makanimitta sūkṣmanira| yathā| kady aṅgāniṅ ākāśa| maṅkana ta bhaṭāra mahādeva| an hana riṅ sarva māvak| ndātar kapaṅguh sira| makanimittaṅ sūkṣmanira||

          (221)(222)

          2.17

          (223)

          (224)(225)

          2.18

          saṅ yogīśvara| umaṅәnaṅәn bhaṭāra| jñāne manahnira| lvirnya| nirmala pratyakṣa hana riṅ sarva māvak| kady aṅgāniṅ tejaniṅ apuy| dumilah rūpanira| hinaṅәnaṅәn saṅ yogīśvara pva bhaṭāra| mantuk ta sira riṅ kamokṣan||

          (226)

          2.19

          fleuron iti brahmarahasyan nāma śāstram| dvitīyaḥ paṭalaḥ fleuron

          (227)

          3

          Brahmarahasya, Paṭala 3

          Brahmarahasyaṁ, T{\rd}tīyaḥ Paṭalaḥ

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          śivātma-nirmalo rudraḥ| kṣānto jīvo ’tiniṣkalaḥ| tataḥ puruṣa evāsīt| bhārūpo sakalaprabhuḥ|| 1

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (228)(229)

          3.1

          bhaṭāra rudra sātmaka lāvan bhaṭāra śiva| nirmala sira| sira atiniṣkala| saṅka ri bhaṭāra rudra| mijil ta saṅ puruṣa| brahmā katattvanira| kadi tejaniṅ āditya| sira ta prabhu||

          (230)

          avyaktaṅ k{\rdit}ṣṇam evāsīt| sūkṣma-nityam atīndriyaḥ| acintya-durlabho jñeyaḥ| tamobhūtam acetanam|| 2

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (231)

          3.2

          saṅke saṅ puruṣa| mijil taṅ avyakta| viṣṇu tattvanira| nitya kahananira| tan kavәnaṅ ginrahya deniṅ indriya| tan kavәnaṅ inaṅәnaṅәn| mevәh kakavruha\-ni\-ra| tamobhūta sira| tan pacetana sira||

          (232)(233)

          avyakta-buddhir evāsīt| gaurī sāttvam ataḥ param| tatas tejas idam āsīt| raktavarṇa-rajomayam|| 3

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (234)(235)(236)

          3.3

          saṅka riṅ avyakta| mijil taṅ buddhi| kuniṅ varṇanira| sattva pinakasvabhā\-va\-ni\-ra| viśeṣa sira| saṅka riṅ buddhi| mijil taṅ ahaṅkāra| bāṅ varṇanira| rajah pinakasva\-bhāvanikā||

          (237)(238)

          tatas taijasā evāsīt| k{\rdit}ṣṇavarṇa-tamomayam| saṅkalpātmana evāsīt| cintātmaṅ gaṇasambhavam|| 4

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (239)(240)

          3.4

          saṅkeṅ ahaṅkāra| mijil taṅ pañcatanmātra| hirәṅ varṇanya| tamah pinaka\-sva\-bhāvanya| sakiṅ pañcatanmātra| mijil taṅ manah| saṅkalpa gavenya| man\-aṅ\-kal\-pa| ṅa| mamilaṅ māṅәnaṅәn svabhāvanya| nāhan dadinya| saṅ\-kal\-pa| vi\-kal\-pa||

          (241)

          tata ākāśam evāsīt| vāhyaṁ śābdam alakṣaṇam| tato bāyur iti spārśam| śabdasparśaguṇātmakam|| 5

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (242)(243)(244)(245)

          3.5

          saṅkeṅ manah mәtuṅ ākāśa| vāhya ya| śabda guṇanya| saṅkeṅ ākāśa mәtuṅ bāyu| śabda sparśa guṇanya||

          bāyor agnis samudbhūtaḥ| śabdasparśavirūpavān| rasarūpaśabdasparśaḥ| tato vā salilātmakaḥ|| 6

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (246)(247)(248)(249)

          3.6

          saṅkeṅ bāyu| mәtuṅ agni| śabda sparśa rūpa guṇanya| saṅkeṅ agni| mәtuṅ apaḥ| śabda sparśa rūpa rasa guṇanya||

          (250)

          śabdasparśavirūpākhyā| rasagandhavatī mahī| etad utpattināmedam| dvādaśākhyan tu pañcadhā|| 7

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          3.7

          saṅka riṅ apah| mәtuṅ p{\rd}thivī| śabda sparśa rūpa rasa gandha guṇanya| nāhan taṅ tattva rvavәlas kvehnya| rudra puruṣa| avyakta buddhi| ahaṅkāra pañcatan\-mā\-tra| manah| ākāśa| bāyu| agni| apah| p{\rd}thivī| nāhan ta lvirnikaṅ tattva| sa| ba| ta| a| i| vījanya||\ledpb

          eteṣām abhiyogatve| jagaddeho ’bhijāyate| tatra tatrāsīn abhūtaḥ| sa eko śiva-tiṣṭhati|| 8

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (251)(252)

          3.8

          ikā ta kapasaṅanikaṅ tattva rudrādi| ya ta pinakaśarīraniṅ jagat kabeh| kunaṅ bhaṭāra śiva| sira ta vyāpaka riṅ rāt| sira viśeṣa| siromuṅguh riṅ tattva kabeh||

          p{\rdit}thivyāṁ śarva eko ’yam| salile bhava-saṁ\-sm{\rdit}taḥ| agnau paśupatir jñeyam| bāyau īśāna-m-eva ca|| 9

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (253)(254)(255)(256)

          3.9

          nihan vibhāga bhaṭāra muṅgv irikaṅ tattva kabeh| śarva ṅaranira yan umandәl iṅ p{\rd}thivī| bhava ṅaranira yan umandәl iṅ toya| paśupati ṅaranira yan umandәl iṅ saṅ hyaṅ agni| īśāna ṅaranira yan umandәl iṅ bāyu||

          (257)(258)(259)(260)

          ākāśe bhagavān bhīmaḥ| mahādevo ’pi mānasi| tanmātrasthe ca ugro yaḥ| taijase rudra ucyate|| 10

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          3.10

          bhīma ṅaranira yan haneṅ ākāśa| kinahanan ta sira deniṅ aṣṭaguṇa| mahādeva ṅaranira yan haneṅ manah| tan māvak| ugra ṅaranira yan haneṅ pañcatan\-mā\-tra| rudra ṅaranira yan haneṅ teja| makāvak ahaṅkāra||

          buddhisthaḥ īśvaro jñeyaḥ| dhātāvyakto mahīṣṭhitaḥ| caitanye puruṣo brahma| kāraṇastho maheśvaraḥ|| 11

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (261)(262)

          3.11

          nihan kavruhakna| saṅ hyaṅ iśvara sira makasthānaṅ buddhi| saṅ hyaṅ brahmā sira abyakta| makasthānaṅ p{\rd}thivī| saṅ hyaṅ puruṣa sira ta bhūtacaitanya| saṅ hyaṅ maheśvara sira ta pinakakāraṇanya kabeh| nāhan taṅ tattva rvavәlas| vinarahakәn saṅ paṇḍita| ri patuṅgaltuṅgalanya| ikaṅ tattva rvavәlas| ya tāṅ\-әn\-aṅ\-әn\-әn\-ira| kapaṅguh taṅ kamokṣan denira| sayojya ta sira lāvan bhaṭāra śiva| tan pādi| tan pamadhya| tan pānta| sira ta bhaṭāra parameśvara| ṅa||

          (263)

          kaṭhinaḥ sarvato bhūmiḥ| dravatvaṁ sarvato jalam| uṣṇatvaṁ sarvato bahniḥ| calatvaṁ sarvato ’nilaḥ|| 12

          3.12

          (264)

          3.13

          (265)(266)

          (270)(271)(272)

          upanyāstaṁ tadāvyaktam| vaiṣṇavī h{\rdit}di saṁsthitam| bhārūpam iti vikhyātam| caitanyam mānuṣaṁ padam|| 15

          (276)

          jīvasya kāraṇaṁ śambhuḥ| niṣkalaṁ śivam akṣaram| brahmādiparameśāntam| śuddhaṁ sūkṣmam anāśravam|| 17

          (280)

          (281)

          sūrya-candro tathā bhomaḥ| vudhaḥ suraguruḥ bh{\rdit}guḥ| śanaiścaras tathā rāhuḥ| dhūmaketus tathaiva ca|| 22

          (289)

          nakṣatramaṇḍalaṁ sarvam| tārāñ ca maṇḍalaṁ dhruvam| ākāśasthe iti sarve| antarikṣaṁ vidur vudhāḥ|| 23

          ikaṅ suku kārva gandhatanmātra gavenya| lumaku maṅher viṣayanya| ma\-mañ\-cal| manaṇḍuṅ gavenya| ya ta dhāraṇәn de saṅ paṇḍita||

          (352)

          (353)(354)(355)

          3.43

          ikaṅ buddhīndriya lima kvehnya| pinakasukhanira saṅ hyaṅ pañcamahābhūta| nāhan taṅ tattva pinakaśarīraniṅ sarva māvak| inajarakәn aghora vījanya| liṅ saṅ paṇḍita| oṁ aṁ namaḥ||

          (356)(357)

          p{\rdit}thivī salilañ cāgniḥ| bāyur ākāśakam manaḥ| daśendriyāni vāhyāni| vikāras te ’pi ṣoḍaśaḥ|| 44

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (358)

          3.44

          p{\rd}thivī| apaḥ| teja| bāyu| ākāśa| manah| mvaṅ daśendriya| ri heṅ ikā kabeh| ya ṣoḍaśavikāra| ṅa||

          māṁsāsthisnāyupittañ ca| keśaromanakhas tathā| h{\rdit}dayādyāś ca vai sarvam| p{\rdit}thivī pañcadhā sm{\rdit}taḥ|| 45

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (359)(360)

          3.45

          nihan vuvusaknaṅku vaneh| ikaṅ dagiṅ mvaṅ tahulan| hotot| rambut| vulu suku| mvaṅ k{\rd}ṣṇa| vuṅsilan| paruparu| pusuhpusuh| hati| limpa| ikā ta ka\-beh| kaharan p{\rd}thivī ṅkeṅ avak| makādi kulit| kavruhana yan dadiniṅ pañ\-ca\-ma\-hā\-bhū\-ta||

          (361)

          rudhiramūtraretāni| svedaśleṣma āsyāsavaḥ| majjamedhañ ca pittādyāḥ| pañcadhā salilaṁ sm{\rdit}tam|| 46

          (362)

          3.46

          (363)

          mukhe mahād api yo ’gniḥ| gārhaspatyas tathodare| h{\rdit}daye dakṣiṇāgniś ca| sambartaḥ\ledpb\ pittake sthitam|||| 47

          (367)(368)

          (371)

          3.80

          (460)

          3.82

          ikaṅ jagat kabeh| sthāvarajaṅgamā\-vaknya| māyā svabhāvanya| rūpa bhaṭāra śiva sahananya| ikaṅ rāt kabeh| i vәkasan līna mare sira||

          (461)(462)(463)

          3.83

          3.84

          fleuron iti brahmarahasyan nāma śāstram| t{\rdit}tīyaḥ paṭalaḥ fleuron

          4

          Brahmarahasya, Paṭala 4

          Brahmarahasyaṁ, Caturthaḥ Paṭalaḥ

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          bhū-līnaṁ salilaṅ gacchet| salilo vahnim āviśet| saḥ bahnir vāyau līyate| bāyur ākāśam āviśet|| 1

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (464)(465)(466)

          4.1

          ikaṅ p{\rd}thivī līna riṅ apah| apah līna riṅ agni| agni līna riṅ bāyu| bāyu līna riṅ ākāśa||

          (467)

          ākāśan tu mano gacchet| bhautivījābhidhānakam| etat bhūtaśarīrākhyam| śarīraniṣṭha-r-ucyate|| 2

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (468)(469)

          4.2

          ākāśa līna riṅ manah| nāhan tattva nәm| ikāna gavenya| makasthānaṅ śarīra| inajarakәn bhautikā vījanya| oṁ aṁ namaḥ|| ike taṅ tattva| śarīraniṅ pañ\-ca\-ma\-hā\-bhū\-ta| vinarahakәn saṅ paṇḍita||

          manas tanmātram āyatvam| tanmātran taijasaṅ gatam| taijasaḥ buddhim āyatvam| gauṇikaṁ sūkṣmadehakam|| 3

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (470)

          4.3

          ikaṅ manah līna riṅ pañcatanmātra| pañcatanmātra līna riṅ ahaṅkara| ahaṅkāra līna riṅ buddhi| nāhan taṅ tattva sūkṣmāvaknya| gauṇikā vījanya| oṁ taṁ namaḥ||

          etan devaśarīrā\-nām| sadasadātmalakṣaṇam| buddhir abyaktam āyatvam| tamodhikam atīndriyam|| 4

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (471)(472)

          4.4

          nāhan taṅ tattva| pinakaśarīraniṅ devata rakva| nihan lvirnya| ikaṅ buddhi līna ya riṅ abyakta| tamah pinakasvabhāvanya| mālit ta ya||

          acintyam atidurjñeyam| vaiṣṇavīvījam ucyate| abyaktaṁ puruṣaṅ gacchet| vyomanirmalasannibham|| 5

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (473)

          4.5

          tar kavәnaṅ hinaṅәnaṅәn| kadi ākāśa nirmala| mevәh kakavruhanira| vaiṣṇavī vījanya| oṁ saṁ namaḥ| ikaṅ abyakta līna riṅ puruṣa| oṁ baṁ namaḥ| vīja ṅkāna||

          bhārūpaṁ śūnyam atyantam| brahma puruṣa-r-ucyate| puruṣa-paramaṅ gatvā| niṣkalaḥ prabhur ucyate|| 6

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (474)

          4.6

          bhaṭāra brahmā sira puruṣa| ṅa| kady aṅgāniṅ ujvalaniṅ āditya rūpanira| aty\-an\-ta śūnyanira| vinarahakәn saṅ paṇḍita| saṅ hyaṅ puruṣa| līna riṅ bhaṭāra śaṅ\-ka\-ra| lvirira niṣkala||

          sajjīva-nirmalañ chūnyam| brahmeśānī nigadyate| etad uktam mayā vījam| jagatpralayakāraṇam|| 7

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (475)(476)(477)

          4.7

          bhaṭāreśvara sira satjīva| sira nirmala| śūnya sira| brahmeśānī vījanira| oṁ iṁ namaḥ|| ikaṅ tattva vinarahakәnku| ya ta kāraṇaniṅ pralayaniṅ jagat| maṅkana liṅ bhaṭāra||

          etat jñātvā mahāyogī| prayāti paramaṁ padam| bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ iti khyātam| pradhānādi-nigadyate|| 8

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (478)(479)

          4.8

          kunaṅ saṅ yogīśvara| kumavruhi rikaṅ tattva| sira ta mantuk riṅ paramapada| hana ta tribhuvana| ṅa| śrota| tvak| cakṣuh| jihvā| ghrāṇa| vāk| sparśa| rūpa| rasa| gandha| p{\rd}thivī| apah| teja| bāyu| ākāśa| manah| nāhan ta lvirnya| ri vәhaṅ-n uṅgu| gāyatrī vīja ṅkāna| vinarahakәnku| oṁ taṁ namaḥ| hana ta pañcaśuddha| ṅa| avidyā| svabhāva| pradhāna| prak{\rd}ti| abyakta| nāhan taṅ lima| vaiṣṇavī vījanya| oṁ saṁ namaḥ||

          (480)(481)(482)

          naiva saṁjñaṁ paraṁ sthānam| pauruṣan vakṣam ucyate| nirmitaṁ paramānandam| brahmākṣaran nigadyate|| 9

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (483)(484)(485)

          4.9

          hana sthāna viśeṣa| ya brahmākṣara| brahmā hyaṅnya| riṅ dhadhasthāna| pauruṣa vīja ṅkāna| oṁ baṁ namaḥ|| hana sthāna viśeṣa| brahmā vīja ṅkāna| brah\-mā paḍa hyaṅnya| brahmādhipati| ya muṅguh riṅ gulu| oṁ iṁ namaḥ||

          (486)

          oṁkāram atyantapadam| ūrdhvātyūrdhvākṣaram param| teṣām ekācalaṁ śūnyam| ś{\rdit}ṇu sarvaṁ viśeṣataḥ|| 10

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (487)(488)(489)

          4.10

          ikaṅ oṅkāra| atyantapada śūnya| maruhur saṅkeṅ īśānapada ya| viśeṣa ya| ikā ta kavruhana patuṅgaltuṅgalanikaṅ loka| ya ta varahaknaṅkva||

          bhūḥloke mānuṣo jñeyaḥ| bhuvaḥlokāntarīkṣakam| svaḥlokaṁ śakramaṇḍalam| trailokyam iti saṁjñikam|| 11

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (490)

          4.11

          ikaṅ bhūḥloka uṅgvaniṅ mānuṣa ikā| ikaṅ bhuvaḥloka| ya ākāśa| ikaṅ svaḥ\-lo\-ka| ya uṅgvan saṅ hyaṅ indra ikā| nāhan taṅ sinaṅguh tribhuvana| ṅa||

          prājāpatyaṁ mahālokam| janalokan tu vaiṣṇavam| tapolokam brahmapadam| satyalokan tu śaṅkaram|| 12

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (491)(492)(493)

          4.12

          ikaṅ mahāloka| ya prajāpatiloka| ṅa| ikaṅ janaloka| ya viṣṇuloka| ṅa| ikaṅ tapoloka| ya brahmaloka| ṅa| ikaṅ satyaloka| ya śaṅkaraloka| ṅa||

          (494)

          aṣṭaśivañ ca paramam| tad ekatattvam ācalam| śivam vā kāraṇacyutam| śūnyaṁ satyam anāśravam|| 13

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (495)(496)(497)

          4.13

          hana ta sthāna viśeṣa| uṅkāra ya| tar pakasurudan| kunaṅ patuṅgaltuṅgalaniṅ aranira saṅ hyaṅ aṣṭaśiva| nihan ta byaktinya||

          (498)

          śrutvā manasi yatnena| dhārayitvāpi te manaḥ| p{\rdit}thivy āpaḥ tathā vahniḥ| bāyur ākāśaka-m-manaḥ|| 14

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (499)(500)

          4.14

          varahaknaṅkva patuṅgaltuṅgalanira saṅ hyaṅ aṣṭaśiva| gәg{\schwal}n ta ya ri manahta| yatnā ta kita| maṅkana ta saṅ paṇḍita kabeh| yatna ta sira riṅ manahnira| ndya ta ya nihan|| p{\rd}thivī| apaḥ| teja| bāyu| ākāśa| manah||

          (501)(502)

          trailokyam evai\-ka\-prā\-ṇaḥ| nānyakramāt samudbhavaḥ| bhūmyapo bhūr iti jñeyaḥ| bahnir bāyuḥ bhuvaḥ sm{\rdit}taḥ|| 15

          (503)(504)(505)

          4.15

          nihan taṅ triloka vinarahakәn saṅ paṇḍita| vruh pva kite kavilaṅaniṅ loka| ikaṅ lәmah lāvan vvai| tinuṅgalakәn saṅ paṇḍita| ya bhūḥloka| ṅa| ikaṅ bahni lāvan bāyu| ya bhuvaḥloka| ṅa||

          ākāśaṁ manas evedam| svarlokam iti saṅjñikam| {saptadvīpaṁ samudrañ ca| mahāntaḥ saptaparvatāḥ||} 16

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (506)(507)(508)(509)

          4.16

          ikaṅ ākāśa mvaṅ manah| ya svarloka| ṅa||

          (510)

          evam abyaktakaṁ sūkṣmam| yathā cintyan na vidyate| tato bhūtam idaṁ sarve| jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam|| 17

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (511)

          4.17

          yathāw| kady aṅgānikā| evaṁ| samaṅkana taṅ abyakta| sūkṣma svabhāvanya| tar inaṅәnaṅәn tәkerikā| mijil taṅ jagat kabeh saka riṅ abyakta| sthāvarajaṅgamā\-vaknya||

          candrakānto yathā vīra| candrajyotsnā ’bhisaṅgamet| tato ’ntaḥnis{\rdit}taḥ toyam| vitatvānekabhogadā|| 18

          (512)(513)(514)

          4.18

          nihan upodghātakna vaneh| ikanaṅ vvai mijil sakeṅ maṇi candrakānta| makanimitta kasaṅgamanya deniṅ tejaniṅ vulan| i vәkasan akveh ta hilīnya riṅ lә\-mah||

          (515)

          tadvad avyaktam atyantam| puruṣenābhisaṅgamet| māyā buddhyādip{\rdit}thvyantam| sūkṣmam bhavati tattvadā|| 19

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (516)

          4.19

          tadvat samaṅkana tekaṅ abyakta| atyanta ya riṅ sūkṣma| masaṅgama pva lāvan saṅ puruṣa| mijil taṅ tattva| buddhyādi| p{\rd}thivyanta| mәtu saṅkeṅ abyakta||

          (517)

          sattvaṁ rajas tamaś caiva| traiguṇyam iti saṅjñakam| teṣān tu viparītena| jagad abyaktako bhavet|| 20

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (518)(519)

          4.20

          sattva| rajah| tamah| yekā triguṇa| ṅa| viparītaniṅ guṇa| ya ta hetuniṅ jagat an vәtu saka riṅ abyakta| viparīta ṅaranya| yan sattva utkaṭa| dadi mānuṣa| yan tamaḥ utkaṭa| dadi tiryak tikā| nāhan ta kramanya||

          (520)(521)

          viparyāyaḥ pañcavidham| aṣṭāviṅśatiśaktayaḥ| tuṣṭiś ca navadhā jñeyaḥ| aṣṭadhā siddhir eva ca|| 21

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (522)(523)

          4.21

          hana pañcaviparyāya| ṅa| hana aṣṭāviṅśatiśakti| ṅa| hana navatuṣṭi| ṅa| hana aṣṭasiddhi| ṅa||

          (524)

          karmayonis tu pañcaite| pañcatapāni dehinām| ṣaṣṭī tattvam idan tantre| kapilasya mahārṣiṇaḥ|| 22

          (525)

          4.22

          hana karmayoni| lima kvehnya| hana pañcatapa| lima kvehnya| nāhan taṅ tattva limaṅ puluh| pinakāji bhagavān kapila| ukta sāra||

          prak{\rdit}teḥ buddhir utpannam| brahmā tatrā\-dhidevataḥ| darśanyam abhibhūtañ ca| tat sattvaṁ samprakāśyate|| 23

          (526)(527)(528)(529)(530)

          4.23

          saṅka riṅ prak{\rd}ti| mәtu taṅ buddhi| brahmā hyaṅnya| vihikan viṣayanya| ikaṅ sattva yāmintonakәn ya||

          (531)

          ahaṅkārotpannaṁ buddheḥ| rudras tatrādhidevataḥ| abhimāno ’dhibhūtaś ca| yāvad rajas tu raudrakam|| 24

          (532)(533)(534)

          4.24

          saṅka riṅ buddhi| mәtu taṅ ahaṅkāra| ikaṅ ambәk tan aṅgā sora| saṅ hyaṅ rudra hyaṅnya| maṅaku viṣayanya| ya rajah| ṅa| ikā||

          pañcāṅgañ caiva mātrāni| ugras tatrādhidevataḥ| vibhājyam adhibhūtañ ca| śiva\-tvan te prakīrtitaḥ|| 25

          (535)(536)(537)

          4.25

          saṅka riṅ ahaṅkāra| mәtu taṅ pañcatanmātra| saṅ hyaṅ ugra devatanya| sira kāraṇaniṅ pañcamahābhūta|| svecchātanmātrapañcadhā| ikaṅ tanmātra lima kvehnyāsiṅ sakahyunya||

          marīci-kaśyapaś caiva| viśvāmitro vaśiṣṭhataḥ| bh{\rdit}guś cāṅgirasaś caiva| jamadagnis tathaiva ca|| 26

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          4.26

          nihan lvirnikā saṅ prajāpati| bhagavān marīci| kaśyapa| viśvāmitra| vaśiṣṭha| bh{\rd}gu| aṅgirasa| jamadagni||

          dakṣaprajāpatiputraḥ| evamādyāḥ caturdaśaḥ| caturmukhaś caturhastaḥ| koṭyārkaḥ sād{\rdit}śaḥ prabhāḥ|| 27

          (538)(539)

          4.27

          sira ta kabeh| anak bhagavān prajāpati dakṣa mahārṣi| nāhan ādinya patbәlas kvehnya| paḍapaḍa riṅ kasiddhyanira| kapva paḍa caturmukha| caturbhuja sira| paḍa lāvan prabhāvaniṅ āditya sakoṭi||

          (540)

          anantakoṭisahasraḥ| mahālokanivāsinaḥ| traiguṇyaṁniratas sarve| trai\-guṇyasamuparjitaḥ|| 28

          (541)(542)

          4.28

          sira ta muṅgv iṅ mahāloka| anantakoṭisahasra kvehnira| paḍa mahyun iṅ tri\-gu\-ṇa| utpādakānugrahabhogātah sira| ya traiguṇya| ṅa| paḍa gumave sattva| ra\-jah| tamah||

          (543)

          gauṇikā mantram ity uktaḥ| traiguṇyañ ca nigadyate| vaiṣṇavaṁ paramasthānam| pañcavarga-prakīrtitaḥ|| 29

          (544)(545)

          4.29

          gauṇikā mantra ṅkāna| ya uṅgvaniṅ sattva rajah tamah| nāhan ta kramanyān vinarahakәnku| oṁ taṁ namaḥ|| hana sthāna uṅgvan saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu| viśeṣa ya| ya pañcavarga| ṅa| vinarahakәn saṅ paṇḍita||

          (546)

          avidyā ca svabhāvaś ca| pradhāna-prak{\rdit}tis tathā| abyakta-paramaṁ sūkṣmam| vaiṣṇava-pañca saṁjñikam|| 30

          (547)

          4.30

          nihan taṅ sinaṅguh pañcavarga| ṅa| bheda saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu| avidyā| svabhāva| pradhāna| prak{\rd}ti| abyakta| nāhan taṅ viṣṇu lima bhedanya| viśeṣa ya| sūkṣma ya| vaiṣṇavī vījanya| oṁ saṁ namaḥ||

          (548)(549)(550)

          na kiñcid api niṣkalam| viṣṇulokan nigadyate| caturvaktraś caturhastaḥ| caturyugavidhāraṇaḥ|| 31

          (551)(552)(553)(554)(555)

          4.31

          ikā taṅ pada| tan hana len saṅkeṅ sakaleriya| ya sinaṅguh viṣṇuloka| ṅa| lvir\-ikaṅ devata hana ṅkāna| paḍa caturmukha| mvaṅ caturbhuja| sira gumave catur\-yuga||

          (556)

          pītavastramahāsūkṣmaḥ| khaḍgacakragadādharaḥ| v{\rdit}hadaśvaś śrīsampannaḥ| nānāyudhadharaḥ sadā|| 32

          (557)

          4.32

          paḍa madodot kuniṅ| pinәnuhaniṅ śrī| paḍa mahāsūkṣma| paḍāṅagәm khaḍ\-ga| cakra| gadā| atiśaya kaiśvaryanira| makveh āyudha ginәg{\schwal}nira| nityakāla||

          (558)

          utpattisthitilīnākhyam| lokānāṅ k{\rdit}takāraṇaḥ| anādimadhyani\-dhanaḥ| sarve garuḍavāhanaḥ|| 33

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (559)

          4.33

          sira ta gumavayakәn loka kabeh| utpattisthitilīnāvaknira| tan pādi tar pamadhya tar pānta| paḍāvāhana garuḍa sakvehnira||

          tamomaya-vaiṣṇavākhyam| janalokanivāsinaḥ| tataḥ paraṁ mahāsūkṣmam| tapolokam anāmayam|| 34

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (560)(561)

          4.34

          tamaḥ pinakasvabhāvanira| maṅkana lvirnikaṅ devata muṅgviṅ janaloka| vaiṣ\-ṇa\-vī vīja ṅkāna| oṁ saṁ namaḥ|| hana ta pada len saṅkerikā| tapoloka| ṅa| atyanta riṅ sūkṣma| kasurudan sukhaduhkha||

          (562)

          bhārūpaṁ nirmalaṁ śūnyam| niścalaṁ pañcato ’bhayam| tatvījaṁ puruṣo divyam| sūkṣmaṁ sūkṣmataraṁ param|| 35

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (563)(564)

          4.35

          kadi tejaniṅ āditya rūpanira| nirmala śūnya tan pacala| tan hana katakutnira| puruṣa vījanya|| brahmā hyaṅnya| sūkṣma saṅkeṅ sūkṣma sira| viśeṣa ya| oṁ baṁ namaḥ||

          (565)

          nirūpan nirvikārañ ca| nissaktam padam acyutam| garbhajanmajarāhīnaḥ| janmakleśavivarjitaḥ|| 36

          Translation

          (566)(567)(568)

          4.36

          tan parūpa| tan pavikāra| tan pāpa| tan hīna| mvaṅ tar kәneṅ garbha jarā ma\-ra\-ṇa| tan pakleśa||

          (569)

          aṣṭaiśvaryaguṇopetaḥ| aṣṭaguṇāmitaprabhaḥ| viśvayajñamahāsūkṣmaḥ| {\rdit}ṣayaḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ|| 37

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (570)

          4.37

          saṅ devata hana ṅkāna| kinahanan ta sira deniṅ kāṣṭaiśvaryan| mvaṅ aṣṭaguṇa| tar pahīṅan tejanira| lvir saṅ {\rd}ṣi hana ṅkā mahāsūkṣma| paḍa maṅulah kabrah\-ma\-cār\-yan| paḍa maṅunyakәn brahmamantra| bāmadeva vījanya| oṁ baṁ na\-maḥ||

          nityadhyānecchatāṁ sarve| nirapekṣañ ca nirmalam| caturvaktrañ caturvedaḥ| kṣamā nirviṣayaṁ dhruvam|| 38

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (571)

          4.38

          mahyun ta sira riṅ dhyāna sakvehnira| nirapekṣa ta sira riṅ viṣaya| śūnya nirmala sira| paḍa caturvaktra| paḍa maṅuccāraṇakәñ caturveda| paḍa kṣa\-ma\-rū\-pa sira| kapva meṅәt||

          (572)

          nirānandaḥ nirāhāraḥ| brahmāstrabrahmacāriṇaḥ| śūnyāc chūnyataraṁ nityam| sarvasaṅgatavarjitam|| 39

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (573)(574)

          4.39

          tatan kәneṅ sukhaduhkha| tar kәneṅ ilik lāvan hyun| paḍa maṅgәg{\schwal} brah\-mās\-tra| śūnya sira sakeṅ śūnya| laṅgәṅ hananira| tar pakahilaṅan| tar kәna ri sa\-vi\-ṣa\-ya\-niṅ indriya||

          anādimadhyanidhanam| sarvajñānañ ca vedinaḥ| tapolokasthito nityam| jarām{\rdit}tyuvivarjanaḥ|| 40

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (575)(576)

          4.40

          tan pādi tan pamadhya tan pānta| vihikan ta sireṅ sarvajñāna kabeh| nitya ta sira haneṅ tapoloka| tan kәna riṅ tuha pati||

          (577)

          garbhajanmajarāhīnaḥ| kleśasaṅghavivarjitaḥ| aṣṭaiśvaryaguṇopetaḥ| cākarāmitasuprabhaḥ|| 41

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          4.41

          tinilaraken ta sira deniṅ garbhajarāmaraṇa| tar kәneṅ kleśa mvaṅ viṣaya| kinahanan ta sira deniṅ kāṣṭaiśvaryan| tan pahīṅan tejanira| maṅkana lvir\-ni\-kaṅ devata haneṅ tapoloka||

          ataḥ parama-sūkṣmatvāt| viśe\-ṣāl lokam acyutam| durjñeyaṁ durvicintyañ ca| śūnyaṁ paramanirmalam|| 42

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (578)(579)

          4.42

          hana ta loka viśeṣa saṅkeṅ tapoloka| viśeṣaniṅ sūkṣmātisūkṣma| tan pahīṅan| mevәh kakavruhanya| mvaṅ kāṅәnaṅәnanya| śūnya ta ya| atiśaya riṅ malilaṅ| īśāna vīja ṅkāna| oṁ iṁ namaḥ||

          anāśrayam anaupamyam| virahakam atīndriyam| tatra rudra-mahābalam| nirālamba-nirutsukaḥ|| 43

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (580)(581)(582)

          4.43

          tar pakahilaṅan| tan papaḍa| tar pagati| tan kagrahya deniṅ indriya| ṅkāna ta kahanan bhaṭāra rudra| atiśaya tejanira| tan pāśraya| tan kәneṅ hyun||

          guṇottamaḥ nirālambaḥ| nirgātro niśśarīriṇaḥ| atiparamaśūnyāntam| nirbāṇan niṣkalaṁ prabhuḥ|| 44

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (583)(584)

          4.44

          uttama ta sira deniṅ aṣṭaguṇa| nirāśraya tar pagātra| tan pāvak| atiśaya ta sira riṅ viśeṣa| śūnya malilaṅ tejanira||

          (585)

          trivarṇo triguṇasthaś ca| triguṇottama\-saṅgataḥ| pañcaiśvaryaguṇopetaḥ| jaṭādhāraṇanidhiyaḥ|| 45

          (586)(587)

          4.45

          tiga varṇanira| a u ma| muṅguh ta sira riṅ uttamapada| śakti ta sira riṅ tri\-gu\-ṇa| satva| rajah| tamaḥ| kinahanan ta sira deniṅ pañcaiśvarya| manidhi ya lvirnya| paḍa dhumāraṇañ jaṭā||

          v{\rdit}ṣadhvajā v{\rdit}ṣapadaḥ| bhasmabhūṣaṇakarburaḥ| candrārdhāṅkajaṭā-sarve| nānārūpaṁ gaṇaṁ śubham|| 46

          (590)

          janmam{\rdit}tyujarāhīnaḥ| vyādhiśokavivarjitaḥ| brahmamantrāvayavākhyam| ūrdhvātyūrdhvataraṁ padam|| 47

          (591)

          4.47

          tar kәneṅ janma jarā tuhānvam mvaṅ pati| tiniṅgalakәn ta sira deniṅ vyādhi mvaṅ śoka| nāhan ta lvirnira saṅ vatәk rudramūrti muṅgv i ṅkāna| ikā taṅ pada maṅkana| avayavaniṅ brahmamantra ikā| tar kәneṅ takut| ya ikā pada maruhur saṅkeṅ aruhur||

          (592)(593)

          pūrve hemakuṭa-m-indro| āgneye vahnim ādiśet| dakṣiṇe yama-saṅsthīraṁ| nair{\rdit}tyāṁ nir{\rdit}tim vaset|| 71

          (651)

          4.71

          kramanya| saṅ hyaṅ indra muṅgv i puñcaknya vetan| saṅ hyaṅ agni muṅgv iṅ agneya| saṅ hyaṅ yama muṅgv i puñcaknya kidul| saṅ hyaṅ nir{\rd}ti muṅgv i puñcaknya nair{\rd}ti||

          (652)(653)

          (654)(655)(656)

          4.72

          saṅ hyaṅ baruṇa ri puñcaknya kulvan| saṅ hyaṅ bāyu muṅgv iṅ bāyabya| saṅ hyaṅ soma ri pucaknya lor| saṅ hyaṅ rudra muṅgv iṅ aiśānya| uṅgvan saṅ hyaṅ rudra ikā kabeh||

          4.73

          nihan kramanta ṅkāna| bhautikamantra riṅ aiśānya| mvaṅ pūrva| oṁ aṁ na\-maḥ|| gauṇikamantra riṅ āgneya| mvaṅ kidul| oṁ taṁ namaḥ||

          nair{\rdit}tyām bāruṇaś caiva| vaiṣṇavaṁ mantram eva ca| bāyabyāṁ soma-saṁnyasya| pauruṣamantram ārabhet|| 74

          (657)(658)

          4.74

          vaiṣṇavamantra riṅ nair{\rd}iti| mvaṅ kulvan| oṁ saṁ namaḥ| pauruṣamantra riṅ bāyabya| mvaṅ lor| oṁ baṁ namaḥ||

          (659)

          madhya ūrdhvam adhasthe ca| brahmīśāna-tu mantrakam| avayavan daśaguṇam| sarveṣāṁ triguṇam viduḥ|| 75

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (660)

          4.75

          brahmīśāna mantra i tәṅah| mvaṅ i sor| i ruhur| oṁ iṁ namaḥ|| kunaṅ pin\-ti\-ga i madhya| pintiga i sor| pin\-ti\-ga i ruhur| avayavanya| kapva maṅdaśaguṇa ikā kabeh| liṅ saṅ paṇḍita||

          (661)

          p{\rdit}thivī salilan tejaḥ| bāyur ākāśakam manaḥ| tanmātrāhaṅkaro buddhiḥ| abyaktapuruṣeśvaraḥ| sarvan tu manasi veda| tattvaṁ daśaguṇaṁ param|| 76

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (662)(663)

          4.76

          p{\rd}thivī| apah| teja| bāyu| ākāśa| manah| tanmātra| ahaṅkāra| buddhi| avyakta| puruṣa| īśvara| ikā taṅ tattva kabeh| viśeṣa ya| ya ta gumave bhaṭāra maṅ\-da\-śa\-gu\-ṇa||

          (664)

          4.77

          fleuron iti bhuvanakośan nāma śāstram| caturthaḥ paṭalaḥ fleuron

          (665)

          5

          Brahmarahasya, Paṭala 5

          Brahmarahasyaṁ, Pañcamaḥ Paṭalaḥ

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          5.1

          an maṅkana vuvus bhaṭāra| matakvan ta saṅ munivara muvah| liṅnira||

          bhagavan devadeveśa| niv{\rdit}tto bhavajanmani| yadi prāṇaṁ parityaktam| śūnyadhyānaṁ samārabhet|| 1

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (666)(667)

          5.2

          he bhagavan| kita kinahanan deniṅ aṣṭaguṇa| he devadeveśa| kita ratuniṅ devata kabeh| nihan takvani ṅhulun ri bhaṭāra| yadin ikaṅ prāṇa tiniṅgalakәn ṅhulun ya| i sdhәṅ huluñ janmasaṅsāra| muvah ikaṅ mānuṣasattva| ri kālanya surud ya| an maṅkana| aparan ta gavayakna rānak bhaṭāra||

          (668)(669)(670)(671)

          kvacit paśyāmi deveśa| kīd{\rdit}śaṅ kiṁ paraṁ mayam| kathaṁ nairātmyam āgacchet| tattvāṅgaṁ tvaya me ’dhunā|| 2

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (672)(673)(674)(675)

          5.3

          he deveśa| ndi taṅ hulun tumona bhaṭāra| kīd{\rdit}śaṁ| mapa ta rūpanira| kim paraṁ mayam| aparan śaktinira| kathaṁ nairātmyam āgacchet| tan pāvak ka\-ri\-kā sira| katon māvak karikā sira| tattvāṅgaṁ tvaya me ’dhunā| aparan tattva\-niṅ avakta| an maṅkana ta pavaraha bhaṭāra maṅke ri ṅhulun||

          (676)(677)(678)(679)(680)

          bhāvyād vā tava śabdeṣu| śarīre dhūmrabhā bhavet| bhāvyād vā tava kāruṇyam| nirbāṇaṅ kathayasva me|| 3

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (681)(682)(683)

          5.4

          mataṅyan maṅkana vuvus bhaṭāra| yapvan vruh ṅhulun ri śabda bhaṭāra| tan kinasandehakәn pavehanya sukha| kadi tejaniṅ vulan| nirbāṇaṅ kathayasva me| varahakna tekaṅ kamokṣan ri ṅhulun| bhāvyād vā tava kāruṇyaṁ| makanimitta kāruṇya bhaṭāra||

          (684)

          bhaumo munivara śreṣṭha| tvac cābhūmo vacaḥ mama| śūnyam atyantakaivalyam| etan nairātmyasaṅgamam|| 4

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (685)

          5.5

          hana ta pada kaivalya| ṅa| kapaṅgihaniṅ niraṅga||

          p{\rdit}thivī pañcamaś caiva| sthiraṅ kaṭhinalakṣaṇam| aṅgapradhānasaṅrambham| samāṅsasnāyupūrvakam|| 5

          (686)(687)

          5.6

          ikaṅ p{\rdit}thivī lima guṇanya| gandha| rasa| rūpa| sparśa| śabda| laṅgәṅ ha\-na\-nya| mākas lakṣanaṇya| ya ta gumave aṅgapradhāna| dagiṅ| tahulan| hotot| ya ta pūrvakanya||

          (688)

          tataś caturguṇan toyam| gandhasparśaś ca lakṣaṇam| rūparasaś ca mūtrādyaḥ| jīvamūrtiṁ paraṁ śubham|| 6

          (689)(690)(691)(692)

          5.7

          guṇaniṅ toya| rasa| rūpa| gandha| sparśa| tәñuh umilī lakṣaṇanya| rāh| mūtra| hariṅәt pinakādinya| saṅ hyaṅ ātmā svabhāvanya| pinakamūrtinya| viśeṣa ya||

          (693)

          triguṇan taijasaḥ vetti| uṣṇaṁ suvarṇalakṣaṇam| t{\rdit}ṣṇakrodhādipūrvañ ca| śarīrajyotir uttamam|| 7

          (697)

          dvimātro bāyur evoktam| sparśaśabdaś ca lakṣaṇam| prāṇo jīvātmako nityam| cetas sarvaśarīriṇām|| 8

          ubhayātma mano vīra| saṅkalpan tat prati prati| sakalaṁ sandhyate pūrvam| niṣkalan tadanantaram|| evam atīndriyaṁ param| manaḥ śūnyam vinaśyati|| 10

          (704)(705)(706)(707)

          5.11

          (708)(709)(710)

          (713)(714)

          kvādhicittaṁ praśāntaṁ syāt| śūnyam atyantaniṣkalam| bhūyas tu kilviṣe naivam| pratyakṣaṁ śūnyaṁ saṅsmaret|| 12

          (722)(723)

          (733)

          ikaṅ sadbuddhi| hana ya| aghora vījanya| oṁ aṁ namaḥ| ikaṅ sadasadbuddhi| hana taya| gāyatrī vījanya| oṁ taṁ namaḥ| ikaṅ asadbuddhi| tan hana ya| vaiṣṇavī vījanya| oṁ saṁ namaḥ| ikaṅ na sadbuddhi| tan hana ya| raudrikā vījanya| uṁ baṁ namaḥ| ikaṅ naivāsadbuddhi| hana ya| tan hilaṅ| tan hilī| brāhmī vījanya| oṁ iṁ namaḥ||

          (786)(787)(788)(789)(790)

          (801)

          nirbāṇam paramaṁ dhyātvā| saṁśuddhaṁ padam āpnuyāt| yadi suptan niruddho ’pi| naraḥ vedanacetasaḥ|| 37

          (802)

          5.38

          kunaṅ de saṅ paṇḍita| inaṅәnaṅәnira taṅ kanirbāṇan| viśeṣa ya| tәlas maṅ\-ka\-na| kapaṅguh ta kaśuddhanikaṅ rāt kabeh| āpan ikaṅ vvaṅ| yadyastun aturuha| katutupana denikaṅ vigraha| humiḍәpa lara cetananya||

          apagrahyan naraḥ sarve| vilambāśrupāte ’kṣiṇāṁ| samb{\rdit}tāśvo vipat tulyaḥ| bhākṣaṅ kuru kurāyate|| 38

          (803)(804)

          5.39

          kepvan atah tvasnikaṅ vvaṅ kabeh| deniṅ kiṅkiṅnya| an gumәg{\schwal} luh ri ma\-ta\-nya| vulaṅun ya mahosyan| maṅkana paḍanya| kumuluṭak kadi sulapit iṅ kuda||

          (805)(806)

          na paśyet sarvaduḥkena| paśyec chivam idaṁ param| atyuṣṇisūryavimbe tu| d{\rdit}ṣṭa-syāc ca sanaiḥ sanaiḥ|| 39

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (807)

          5.40

          ikaṅ maṅkana| katon sakvehniṅ duḥkha| kunaṅ vulatananira bhaṭāra śiva| sira tar kәneṅ saṅsāra| viśeṣa sira| huvus pva sira maṅәnaṅәn bhaṭāra| vulatanani\-re\-kaṅ maṇḍala saṅ hyaṅ āditya sdhәṅ mapanas| halonalonatah denirār vulat||

          (808)

          yadi taptaḥ janaḥ kleśe| śūnyapadaṁ sanaiḥ sanaiḥ| vedya na vyādhisamb{\rdit}taḥ| dehamūrtīśa-vidyate|| 40

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (809)(810)(811)(812)

          5.41

          (813)(814)

          meghajālanigañ candram| sandhasuniśa nirmalam| evan nirbāṇam ādhikyam| śūnyam atyantanirmalam|| 41

          (817)

          svātmā bhūtātmano gatvā| tad evam adhigacchati| paścād vāpi tathā vīra| śūnyasāṁnidhyam acyutam|| 42

          (818)(819)

          (820)

          sarvaiśvaryaguṇopetaḥ| ayu\-tā\-di\-tya\-te\-ja\-saḥ| jñānena nāśyate pāpam| śarīraṁ taptaṁ rātrivat|| 43

          (821)(822)(823)(824)(825)

          5.44

          i sdhәṅ saṅ hyaṅ atmān luput saṅkeṅ śarīra| pinaṅguhnira ta guṇaniṅ kaiśvaryan kabeh| paḍa sira lāvan tejaniṅ āditya sāyuta| hilaṅ ta pāpanira deniṅ jñāna| a u ma oṁ| nāhan taṅ jñāna pamisarjana pāpa||

          (829)

          (832)

          (841)

          sukhan devaśarīre ’smin| nirbāṇaṁ sulabhaṁ caret| tad idaṁ janmarahasyam| ādimadhyāvasānakam| pravakṣyāmy adhunā vīra| niśśeṣan te mahātmane||49

          (842)(843)(844)(845)

          5.50

          āpan ikaṅ kadadin| devaśarīra meman ya| ikaṅ kamokṣan memana ta ya| ya ta pinaṅguh de saṅ paṇḍita| ikā taṅ jñāna maṅkana| karahasyaniṅ janma ikā| ya ta vinarahakәnku| riṅ ādimadhyanya| mvaṅ avasānanya| niśśeṣa deṅku mavarah iri kita| āpan viśeṣa ya| maṅkana vuvusaṅkve ri kitaṅ vīra||

          (846)(847)(848)

          5.51

          ikaṅ rahasya viśeṣa ya| ya ta hinumәn saṅ paṇḍita| mataṅyan deyaniṅ śiṣya| śraddhā ta ya| satata tumutakәna svadharmaniṅ guru| magәlәma ta ya ma\-bra\-ta| bhakti ta ya maguru| maṅkana kramaniṅ śiṣya| hayva tan suśrūṣa riṅ guru| tar vvehana de saṅ guru ikaṅ vvaṅ tan gurubhakti||

          (849)

          (850)(851)(852)(853)

          5.52

          yan śiṣya tar vruh iṅ vedaśāstra| tan vehananira ya| yan śiṣya ahaṅkārāvamāna riṅ guru| tar vehәnira| yan śiṣya bvat mavәr{\schwal} tvak laṅgәṅ vәrәvәrәn tan vehәn ikā| yan śiṣya tan gumәg{\schwal} brata| tan vehәn ya| yan śiṣya kasyasih| tar vehәnira ya| muvah yan nīca ya tar vehәnira| yan śiṣya niṣkrama tan vehәnikā| yan śiṣya bvat maṅupәt riṅ guru| tan vehәnira ya||

          (854)(855)(856)

          5.53

          riṅ śiṣya guruśuśrūṣa| mvaṅ mahyun iṅ dharma rahasya varah saṅ guru| śānta\-citta subhakti makadon kapūjāniṅ pāda saṅ guru| śiṣya nitya gumavayakәn i sva\-kār\-ya saṅ guru| mahyun i kagavayaniṅ tapa| ikaṅ śiṣya maṅkana kramanya| ma\-hyu\-na ta saṅ guru mājarakәna ikiṅ dharma rahasya||

          (857)

          fleuron iti bhuvanakośan nāma śāstram| brahmarahasyaṁ pañcamaḥ paṭalaḥ fleuron

          6

          Jñānasiddhāntaśāstra, Paṭala 1

          Jñānasiddhāntaśāstraṁ, Prathamaḥ Paṭalaḥ

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          6.1

          fleuron oṁ girīśvarāya namaḥ fleuron

          (859)

          ... hetuniṅ sinaṅguh matuhā| hayva tan prayatna rikeṅ siddhāntaśāstra| rapvan tan kapātaka||1

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          kim punaḥ janma mohaś ca| na jñānaḥ na k{\rdit}to ’dhanaḥ| ... na śīlo na vayastapaḥ|| 2

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (860)(861)

          6.2

          ṅuniyuni tekaṅ vvaṅ moha| tan pajñāna| tan śīla| tan gumavayakәn dhana\-dā\-na| tan iṅ vayah| tan iṅ tapa| hayva rakva tan panәmvaṅ pāpa||

          (862)

          tena jñānena he skanda| v{\rdit}ddha\-v{\rdit}d\-dha\-ta\-ra-sm{\rdit}taḥ| na dīrghaiḥ śmaśrubhiḥ keśaiḥ| na śvetarūpajātibhiḥ||3

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (863)(864)(865)

          6.3

          saṅsiptanikā saṅ vidvan| saprayatnā ri saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntajñāna sira| sira ta matuhātәmәn| āpan matuha deniṅ jñānanira| maṅkanānaku saṅ kumāra| tan ikaṅ madavā kumisnya| tan ikaṅ atiśaya tuhānya| tan ikaṅ madavā rambutnya| tan ikaṅ maparas alәṅis keśanya| tan ikaṅ vvaṅ aruhur kajātinya| ikaṅ sin\-aṅ\-guh matuhā| ṅa||

          (866)(867)(868)

          sarvaśāstram a\-dhīyeta| tyajanti jñānam uttamam| jñānam vāpi na vindeta| aho māyāvimohitaḥ||4

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (869)(870)(871)(872)(873)

          6.4

          hana sira sādhaka maṅaji sarvaśāstra| ikā saṅ hyaṅ siddhānta uttama inār\-ya\-kәn\-ira| jñānaṁ vāpi na vindeta| ikā ta saṅ sādhaka maṅkana| tar vruh riṅ jñā\-na\-ṅku ikā| aho māyāvimohitaḥ| āpan kavәnaṅ deniṅ bañcanaṅku||

          (874)(875)(876)(877)

          6.5

          sarvaśāstrasya yat param| hana karih śāstra lәvih saṅkerikaṅ śāstra ka\-beh| siddhāntajñānam uttamam| saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntajñāna sira viśeṣanya| a\-dhī\-tya mānavo loke| hana pva vvaṅ maṅaji saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntajñāna irikaṅ loka| saphalan tasya jīvitam| ya ta saphala huripnyān haneṅ loka| liṅ bhaṭāra maṅkana pva ya||

          (878)(879)(880)(881)(882)(883)(884)

          6.6

          ihatra ca mahādevi| riṅ ihatrakāla pva ya| kapaṅguh taṅ sukha māg{\schwal}ṅ denya| paratra śivatām brajet| irikaṅ dlāha pva ya| sayojya\ pva sira lāvan bhaṭāra śiva saduga||

          (885)

          6.7

          evam etāni yuktāni| ikā ta aṅhiṅ hīṅaniṅ varahvarahku ri kita bhaṭārī| atyanta yukti tәmәn| na sandeho varānane| tan saṅsāra ikaṅ kumavruhi riṅ jñāna maṅkana| maṅkana ta kita bhaṭārī| hayva saṅśaya irikaṅ varahvarah| evam etāni sarvāṇi| vacanāni suputraka| maṅkana ta kitānaku saṅ kumāra| hayva ta kita saṅśaya ri varahvarahku kabeh ri kita||

          (886)(887)(888)(889)(890)

          6.8

          evaṁ jñānam mahādevi| na prakāśati tattvavit| kunaṅ deyanira saṅ tat\-tva\-vit| ike saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntajñāna| vinuvus ta bhaṭārī| rahasyan neryatāṁ tvayā| tar varahakna ya denta riṅ janma kuhaka| yapvan varahaknanta saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntajñāna| saṅ vәnaṅ manūta maryādaniṅ guruyāga| pañ\-ca\-pa\-ṇa\-dha\-naṁ yadi| ikaṅ mās kālih sapaha| yan maṅkana vehaknanira saṅ hyaṅ jñā\-na\-sid\-dhān\-ta| de saṅ paṇḍita||

          (891)(892)(893)(894)

          6.9

          fleuron iti jñānasiddhāntaśāstram| prathamaḥ paṭalaḥ fleuron

          7

          Bhasmamantrasakalavidhiśāstra, Paṭala 2

          Bhasmamantrasakalavidhiśāstram, Dvitīyaḥ Paṭalaḥ

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          7.1

          vāhyotpattisthitilīnam| saṅ hyaṅ vindu| yeki varahaknaṅkv iri kita bha\-ṭā\-rī| lāvan hyaṅnira| brahmā| viṣṇu| īśvara||

          mano buddhir ahaṅkāraḥ| utpattiś ca nigadyate| brahmā viṣṇu-śivaś caiva| utpattiś ca nigadyate||2

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (895)(896)

          7.2

          saṅ hyaṅ brahmā sira manah| saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu sira buddhi| saṅ hyaṅ śiva sira ahaṅkāra| nāhan ta lvirnira utpatti vinarahakәn saṅ paṇḍita||

          (897)

          buddhir ahaṅkāro manaḥ| sthitir eva nigadyate| śivo brahmāpi viṣṇuś ca| sthitir evan nigadyate||3

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (898)(899)

          7.3

          nihan byaktanirān sthiti| saṅ hyaṅ śiva sira buddhi| saṅ hyaṅ brahmā sira ah\-aṅ\-kā\-ra| saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu sira manah| nāhan ta lviriṅ sthitinira||

          emahaṅkāro mano buddhiḥ| pralīnañ ca nigadyate| brahmā viṣṇu śivaś caiva| pralīnañ ca nigadyate||4

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (900)(901)

          7.4

          lviriṅ pralīnanira nihan| saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu sira ahaṅkāra| saṅ hyaṅ brahmā sira buddhi| saṅ hyaṅ śiva sira manah| nāhan ta lvirnirān pralīna| inajarakәn saṅ paṇḍita||

          ukāro līyate ’kāre| akāro līnam makāre| makāro līna-vinduke||5

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (902)(903)(904)

          7.5

          nāhan tattva saṅ hyaṅ vindu| abhyantara pralīna| saṅ hyaṅ ukāra| līna ri saṅ hyaṅ akāra| saṅ hyaṅ akāra līna ri saṅ hyaṅ makāra| saṅ hyaṅ makāra| līna riṅ vindu|| nihan prayoganira saṅ hyaṅ utpattisthiti\-pra\-līna| uṁ aṁ mam||

          (905)

          oṅkāraṁ rudram ity uktam| umā svāhā tathaiva ca| u svāhā brahmā oṅkāram| svāhāpati-japed vudhaḥ|| 6

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (906)

          7.6

          nihan tattva saṅ hyaṅ oṅkāra| yan saṅ hyaṅ rudra sira oṅkāra| saṅ hyaṅ ukāra sira umā| yan saṅ hyaṅ brahmā sira oṅkāra| saṅ hyaṅ ukāra sira svāhā| ya dampatī| ṅa| kavruhana saṅ paṇḍita||

          oṁkāra syād idaṁ pūrvam| mantraṅ k{\rdit}tvāpi śodhanam| bhasmamuṣṭin tathā kūryāt| śivaṁ bhavatu mānavaḥ|| 7

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (907)

          7.7

          vruḥ pva sira riṅ ādi deva saṅ hyaṅ oṅkāra| gavenikā karaśodhana rumuhun| mvaṅ mantranira| huvus pva sira maṅkana| gavayakna taṅ bhas\-ma\-mu\-ṣ\-ṭi| mv\-aṅ śivīkaraṇa||

          (908)

          hutāśanañ ca oṅkāram| kāṣṭhaṁ brahmākṣaran tathā| umā jvālam mahādīptam| dhūma-rudras tathaiva ca|| 8

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          7.8

          apa ta ginave saṅ paṇḍita bhasma nihan| ike saṅ hyaṅ brahmamantra kaharan kayva| saṅ hyaṅ oṅkāra kaharan apuya| gumәsәṅīkaṅ kayu| bhaṭārī umā sira ta dilahniṅ apuy| bhaṭāra rudra sira kaharan kukus||

          (909)(910)(911)

          vījam brahmākṣaraṁ sarvam| vahnir oṅkāram eva ca| svāhānte iti āhutvā| bhasmaśeṣan dine dine||9

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (912)

          7.9

          vruh pva saṅ paṇḍita ri kagavayanira saṅ hyaṅ bhasma| ya ta mataṅyan pa\-mū\-jā sira ri saṅ hyaṅ agni| saṅ hyaṅ brahmamantra sira kaharan vīja| ya ta pa\-mū\-jā\-ni\-ra ri saṅ hyaṅ agni| saṅ hyaṅ oṅkāra mvaṅ saṅ hyaṅ svāhā| sira ta ka\-har\-an apuya| sira pinūjā saṅ paṇḍita|| bhas\-ma\-śe\-ṣa saṅ hyaṅ apuy sovesove| ya ta bhasmakna saṅ paṇḍita||

          (913)(914)(915)(916)(917)

          oṅkāra-bhasmakam vindyāt| āpo viṣṇur iti sm{\rdit}taḥ| agnim vā brahmavikhyāntam| jñātvā mokṣan na saṅśayaḥ||10

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (918)(919)

          7.10

          ndya ta lvir saṅ hyaṅ bhasma nihan| saṅ hyaṅ oṅkāra sira bhasma| saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu sira vvai| saṅ hyaṅ brāhmā sirāpuya| sira ta tatan paśeṣa mo\-kṣa\-ni\-ra||

          brahmā karatalaṁ vyaktam| viṣṇuḥ pūrvaka-m-eva ca| sarvāṅguli-śivaṁ jñeyam| muktāntaṁ padam āpnuyāt||11

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (920)

          7.11

          nyan kavruhana de saṅ mahyun uṅgvān iṅ bhaṭāra| saṅ hyaṅ brāhmā riṅ ka\-ra\-ta\-la| pratyakṣa sira ṅkāna| saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu pūrva sira| saṅ hyaṅ śiva riṅ sarvāṅguli sira| enak pva ya vruh saṅ sādhaka| ri tattva saṅ hyaṅ śivabhasma| lāvan ka\-nyā\-sa\-nira||

          (921)(922)

          śiva-bhasma samākhyāntaḥ| vedi karatalan tathā| aṅgulyāḥ samidhaṁ proktam| rekhā maṇḍalam eva ca||12

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (923)(924)(925)

          7.12

          saṅ hyaṅ śivabhasma kavruhana saṅ sādhaka| irikaṅ karatāla vedi| ikaṅ aṅguli ya samīt| tulisniṅ karatāla ya padmamaṇḍala||

          (926)(927)(928)

          pañcabhāgañ chiraḥ kūryāt| pañcamantram udāharet| pūrve sa dakṣiṇe ba syāt| paścime ta nyaset vudhaḥ||13

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (929)(930)

          7.13

          saṅ hyaṅ śivabhasma pañcadeśaknanira| mvaṅ mantra unyāknanira| sa| pūr| ba| da| ta| pa||

          (931)(932)

          7.14

          uttaryāghorakaṁ sthānam| a| u| mūrdhni-m-īśānam eva ca| i| ri vun\-vun\-an| liṅgamūrdhni mukhaṁ śivam| riṅ liṅga riṅ mukha| bhaṭāra śiva| mvaṅ riṅ mūr\-dh\-ni| yad īkṣaṁ sthāpayen naraḥ| ya ta ṣaḍaṅga bhaṭāra śiva| in\-a\-dhi\-ṣṭhā\-na riṅ mūrdhni| ṅkāna ta devatanikaṅ dik vidik| adhiṣṭhānәn saṅ sādhaka| ndya ta lvirnya nihan||

          (933)(934)(935)(936)(937)

          pūrvāsyam īśvaram vindyāt| brahmā dakṣiṇato mukham| paścime tu mahādevam| uttare vaiṣṇavaṁ mukham||15

          (938)(939)

          (940)(941)(942)

          kakudlalāṭake kaṇṭhe| bāhvoḥ h{\rdit}di stanodare| nābhip{\rdit}ṣṭhe tu tad bhasmam| pādayor yojayet sadā|| 16

          8

          Jñānasaṅkṣepa, Paṭala 3

          Jñānasaṅkṣepaṁ, T{\rd}tīyaḥ Paṭalaḥ

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          8.1

          deva uvāca|

          8.2

          tәlas kavicāran saṅ hyaṅ śivabhasma| inujarakәnku ri kita bhaṭārī| kunaṅ phalaniṅ nityaśoca| pājaraknaṅkve kita vaneh||

          pattraśaucaphalan devi| sahasram vā dine dine| p{\rdit}thvīśaucam vā salakṣam| jalaṁ vāyutam eva ca|| 1

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (977)(978)(979)

          8.3

          ikaṅ roṇḍon pinakaśoca| sevu phalanya| yan dina dina| ikaṅ p{\rd}thivī pina\-ka\-śau\-ca| sātus hivu phalanya| ikaṅ jala pinakaśoca| sāyuta phalanya||

          8.2

          bhasmaśauca-phalan dadyāt| sahasrakoṭitatphalam| nihan phalaniṅ bhasma pinakaśoca| sevu koṭi phalanya| aprameyaṁ jñānaśaucam| hana ta ka\-piṅ\-li\-ma\-niṅ śoca| aṅhiṅ jñānaśoca juga lәvih sakiṅ śoca kabeh| ya tikā aprameya phalanya| yekā pavarahaṅkve kita bhaṭārī||

          kaniṣṭhaṁ pattraśaucānam | madhyamaṁ p{\rdit}thivīn tathā| dvābhyāṁ śaucañ jalaṁ devi| traibhyaḥ bhasman tu śaucake|| 3

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (980)(981)

          8.5

          nihan ta kramanya| ikaṅ roṇḍon pinakaśoca| kaniṣṭhā ya| ikaṅ lәmah pinaka\-śo\-ca| madhyā ya| ikaṅ jala pinakaśoca| uttamā ya| mataṅyan lәvih sakeṅ rvan| bhasma pinakaśoca| lәvih saṅkeṅ tiga||

          (982)(983)

          ebhyo śaucottama-jñānam| guhyād guhyatamaṁ sm{\rdit}tam| etat sarvam prayatnena| vidyāt viśokamanasaḥ|| 4

          Translation

          No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdBhuvanakosa

          (984)(985)

          8.6

          ikā taṅ roṇḍon lәmah vvai bhasma| an pinakaśoca| alah deniṅ jñānaśoca juga| aṅhiṅ jñānaśoca uttama saṅke rikā kabeh| rahasya saṅkeṅ rahasya| yekā kavruhananta bhaṭārī| deyanta kumavruhīrikā| sarvaprayatnā kiteriya| donikān kinavruhan| hilaṅaniṅ saṅsāra| maṅkana liṅ bhaṭāra riṅ bhaṭārī||

          (986)

          kim bhasmanaḥ vījaṁ yadā| sāmānyaṁ ... | kiṁ mantranirmantrasamānyam eva|| 5

          (987)(988)

          8.7

          liṅ bhaṭārī| aparan ta lvirniṅ vīja saṅ hyaṅ śivabhasma| sājñā bhaṭāra| yan sāmānya vīja rikā| mvaṅ āparan ta mantranira| yan sāmānyamantra kunәṅ| apa samantra kari ya| tan pamantra kunәṅ| maṅkana riya sājña bhaṭāra| maṅkana liṅ bhaṭārī|\\ deva uvāca| liṅnira||

          8.8

          (992)(993)(994)

          8.9

          ndya kārikā sinaṅguhan bhasma| sira ta sahajakna riṅ śarīra| sira sakala\-niṣ\-ka\-la\-bhasma| ṅa| kunaṅ saṅ vruh irikā| sira ta mokti| ṅa||
